modules.description: This library enables constructing and validating command-line interfaces by defining specifications for flags, positional arguments, and environment variables, using types like `spec` and `cfg` to model configurations. It operates on primitive values (booleans, numbers, files) and composes them into structured data (lists, tuples, optional values) through parsing combinators. Designed for integration with Cmdliner, it supports use cases like building type-safe CLIs, converting raw arguments into validated runtime configurations, and handling nested or conditional parameters.
